# Troubleshooting & FAQ

## 1. Common Issues

### â— `Sparse index directory not found`

Make sure you cloned it properly:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index.git sparse-index
```

### â— 429 Too Many Requests

Solutions:

- Use an authenticated token:

```bash
CRATES_IO_TOKEN=<token>
```
- Reduce frequency of runs
- Let caches handle daily refreshes

### â— Failed to parse cache

Fix:

```bash
rm cache/index_cache.json
rm cache/crates_cache.json
cargo run -- -s sparse-index
```

### â— Resume not working

Use:
```bash
cargo run -- -s sparse-index --force-fresh
```
